name: One In the Chamber, One In the Socket
name_original: One In the Chamber, One In the Socket
description:
"One In the Chamber, One In the Socket" is a topdown shooter with a twist- your bullets are your only light source, so good luck if you run out of ammo because you're going to need it.

CONTROLS:

- WASD to move

- Mouse to aim and shoot

- R to restart

- Escape to quit

Tools used:

- SFML/C++

- Aseprite

- FL Studio 12

- Sfxr

Originally created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 39.
